TextView.android:text: The Clower Stats Baseball Salaries\nApp uses the best weighted combination of important performance variables to determine whether your favorite players are under or overvalued in the baseball marketplace.

\nWe assign a “Player Value” to each individual based on performance variables from his career (not including the current season). Different performance variables might be more or less correlated with salary for different positions (i.e. Catchers may have different important variables factoring into their value than First Basemen).

\nIn addition, some particular performance variables which are not listed may still be important. However, it is likely the case that the variable is highly correlated with the variables already in the equation, and will not add any additional predictive power.
